thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Nicki Lembcke

author: Nicki Lembcke
title: Nicki Lembcke
text: From initial inquiries, right through to delivery the process was very simple and very fast. Emails were responded to in a very timely manner, the process of getting designs done was simple and timely and delivery was also exceptionally fast as well. All round an easy and simple process and Allister was more than happy to help with any queries/concerns that I had in a very timely manner.
